      • getCalculationInputs

        public Response<PropertyData> getCalculationInputs(GetCalculationInputsRequest request)
        Calls the REST service to get the required inputs to run a Calculation for a given tariffId. The tariffId can be explicitly stated within the GetCalculationInputsRequest object, or if it is null, the service will expect it to be in the Account that is passed in.
        Parameters:
        request - The request.
        Returns:
        The return value.

      • runCalculationOnAccount

        public Response<CalculatedCost> runCalculationOnAccount(java.lang.String accountId,
                                                        java.lang.Long masterTariffId,
                                                        org.joda.time.DateTime fromDateTime,
                                                        org.joda.time.DateTime toDateTime,
                                                        DetailLevel detailLevel,
                                                        GroupBy groupBy)
        Runs calculation on Account using a simplified method with passed in parameters.
        Parameters:
        accountId - The accountId.
        masterTariffId - The masterTariffId.
        fromDateTime - The fromDateTime.
        toDateTime - The toDateTime.
        detailLevel - The detailLevel.
        groupBy - The groupBy.
        Returns:
        The return value.
